Course Description:
THIS COURSE TEACHES VARIOUS COMPUTERIZED ACCOUNTING APPLICATIONS, INCLUDING THE USE OF EXCEL, TO PREPARE ACCOUNTING RECORDS AND
REPORTS AND INTERPRET ACCOUNTING INFORMATION.
Objectives / Learning Outcome(s) / Major:
1. DEVELOP ACCOUNTING RECORDS AND REPORTS UTILIZING EXCEL.
2. DEVELOP DATABASES OF ACCOUNTING-RELATED INFORMATION UTILIZING ACCESS.
3. INTERPRET COMPUTER-GENERATED REPORTS.
4. RECOMMEND COURSES OF ACTION BASED ON COMPUTER-GENERATED REPORTS.
5. EXPLAIN ALTERNATIVE USES OF COMPUTER APPLICATIONS IN ACCOUNTING.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
